title: Disconnected / Reconnected in Ranked game!
body: So around 11pm last night I was in a ranked game and for the first 20 minutes everything was fine and then all of a sudden there was a massive lag spike that affected everyone in the game. That was the catalyst to a series of "attempting to reconnect" and the game lagging like crazy for the remainder of the games duration. I've seen a few people who have also posted a thread with this issue and was wondering what to do / will anything be done because it was just a waste of a game and lp down the drain. Anyone else experienced this last night? (27th of Feb)

replies.body: Thanks I appreciate it! I don't think their doing anything about it though?

happen to me too at around the same time, thought it was weird and now it's been doing it randomly in two games I played today so i'm just at a lost of what to do. i even recorded what it does in a bot game and it does like a one to two min disconnect then reconnects and another one happens like after 10-20 mins in intervals per say so maybe we're having the same issue but just thought i would comment.
